array.string: My head is getting smaller everyday.
Soon I will be moving out of my parent's basement.
I no longer live in a van down by the river.
I deserve to pay my child support.
I make smart choices with my food stamp money.
I never use my welfare payments to buy crack.
My pot use is for medical purposes only.
I have the drive to become a manager at Jack in the box.
My beer skill is valued and valuable.
My drug dealer respects me.
My pimp doesn't beat me up anymore.
My methlab won't explode this week.
My pet nutra-rat loves me.
I do not impregnate my siblings.
I am in perfect health.
I repell illness.
Everyday I grow more healthy.
I claim my right to perfect health.
My body is wonderful and I want to take good care of it.
I make healthy choices. These make my body stronger.
I feel stronger every day.
Every part of my body is working perfectly.
I listen to my body's needs to stay healthy and happy.
With each breath, I am stronger and more healthy.
My food choices will always be the best for me.
Healthy eating is healthy living.
I will walk everyday.
Working out makes me feel better about myself.
illness is my enemy.
I love my job.
I love doing an excellent job.
Completing tasks at work empowers me.
I am eager to complete my projects and tasks at work.
I am an important part of my workplace.
My coworkers respect me and my work.
I am valuable contributor in my workplace.
Every day I feel more confidence in myself.
My skills and abilities are valued and valuable.
I have creative solutions to my employers needs.
I am releasing all my stress.
I am at peace.
My muscles are now relaxed.
I am intelligent. I am able to think clearly and creatively.
With every breath I am more relaxed.
Stress flows away from me like a water flows downstream.
I have the power to bring balance to my life.
My mind is filled with positive thoughts.
I am calm in all situations.
I bring peace and calm with me into every room.
I am at peace even with things around me are chaotic.
I enjoy saving money.
I am smart with my money. I spend it wisely.
My debt is getting smaller every day.
I respect the power money has, but it does not rule me.
I am in control of my money.
Money is attracted to me.
I am becoming financially successful.
I deserve financial success.
I am focused on achieving financial security.
I am confident in the value of my talents. I will use them to create my wealth.
I am a worthy human being.
I find all things are possible.
Difficult tasks are simply challenges that help me shine.
I thrive on challenges and new experiences.
I love myself and am loved by others.
I believe in myself.
I am in control of my thoughts and feelings.
Every day I feel more confidence in myself.
I am a good person.
My feelings and opinions are valid and should be heard.
I love my partner.
My partner meets my needs and I meet theirs.
My partner loves me.
I only bring positive people into my life.
Positive people are attracted to me.
I am attractive and lovable.
I am worthy of being loved.
Loving others is a priority to me.
I make friends easily.
I attract good and kind people into my life.
I find exercise gives me more energy.
I understand portion control and do not overfill my plate.
Fat melts off of me.
I have healthy body. It becomes more healthy every day.
I am beautiful and healthy.
I don't put more on my plate than I need to eat.
I find exercise fun and enjoyable.
Losing weight is easy for me.
I make good and healthy eating choices.
I stop eating when I am full.
I do not overeat, I am ok leaving food on my plate.
I do not overeat, I enjoy leftovers the next day.
I am in control.
My happiness comes from within.
I have everything I need to be happy.
The only thing in control of me is me.
My life is free of all negative chains.
My life is free of all negative habits.
Being in control comes easily to me.
I respect my mind and my body.
I make friends easily.
I am more happy with myself everyday.
I act deliberately and consciously.
I concentrate on a task until it is done.
I am calm and alert, ready to complete any task before me.
Actions around me do not distract me.
I am calm and focused on my work.
Concentration comes easily to me.
I have willpower and I am strong.
I am productive and effective.
I use my time effectively.
I will breathe deeply and with each breath feel more calm and focused.
Concentation seems easy and natural.
I will not be stopped by fear.
I am happy.
I am an intelligent human being.
I love myself and those around me.
Smiling makes me feel good.
I am confident in my abilities.
I have faith in who I am.
I trust myself.
I have clarity of thought.
I choose what thoughts are in my mind.
